attributes.action: monitor muslim movements - tackle racial tensions from WITHIN communities rather than WITHOUT Muslims - Britain has always been rightly proud of it's "free society", but that doesn't mean a "free for all".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Osama bin Laden's chief deputy warned that the terror group still has plans to target Western countries which have been involved in the Iraq war", AOL today reports - so what are we doing about it ?

No - one wants a return to Nazi Germany police state. Everyone wants peace in our time, freedom from fear and religious persecution, respect for differences, harmonious communities to raise our families and stable societies in which the economy can flourish - but these threats still need to be taken seriously. 

Please examine some kind of registration system - like bail conditions, so movements can be monitored. Innocent, peaceful Muslims will soon pressurise more extremist elements into proper conduct for the greater good ! This solution will tackle racial tensions from WITHIN, communities rather than WITHOUT Muslims.

Enjoying rights of citizenship requires responsibilities also.
